product.name: Double Track Curtain Rail Ceiling Mounted,Silent Heavy Aluminum Duty Curtain Track System,Sliding Rails for Curtains, Room Divider for Bedroom Living Room Hospital,White(3M(10.8FT))
product.description:
Transform Your Space with [HLHHDFC] Double Curtain Tracks — Where Quiet Luxury Meets Unshakable Strength
Imagine curtains gliding like morning mist — silent, smooth, and utterly graceful. Our heavy-duty ceiling curtain system isn't just hardware; it's the invisible hand that shapes your perfect living story.
Designed for Real-Life Moments
• New Moms: Instantly partition living rooms into makeshift nurseries during late-night feeds
• Remote Workers: Convert spaces into Zoom-ready studios in minutes
• Aging Parents: Anti-slip bathroom tracks with easy-clean
Features:
- The aluminum bracket track will last for many years.
- The hidden pulleys are very unique and can be hidden perfectly.
- To provide you with an effective room divider solution.
- Top hidden screws installation for heavy/light curtains.
product.bullet_points:
• HEAVY-DUTY DOUBLE TRACK CEILING MOUNT ROD:Crafted with 1.8mm aviation-grade aluminum alloy, this double-track curtain track with stands 66LBS(30KG) loads - 2x stronger than standard rails, prevents bending,and slides freely, and hang heavy luxury curtains
• SILENT TRACK SET:curtain rail track have Low-friction hidden rollers with PVC silent strips reduce noise to 30-40dB
• ADJUSTABLE DROP CEILING CURTAINS TRACKS SYSTEM:pre-cut rails (39"/100cm segments with connectors), pulleys, end covers, and mounting hardware,Concealed screws create seamless hidden track appearance, while leak-proof design blocks light gaps
• MULTI-SCENARIO CURTAIN RAIL TRACK SOLUTIONS:Wide 4" double-track curtain rail prevents curtain overlap, this curtain track perfect for living rooms/bedrooms/hotels/clinics,and can also be used for hanging partitions or anywhere
• COMBINE FREELY:This Double Row Curtain Track In addition to the built-in set of accessories,For every meter of partition, an additional connector is provided, and you can freely combine the size
